title: nf-core/scrnaseq pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

expected_cells.errorMessage: Expected cells must be an Integer

min_assignment_confidence.description: Override CMO demultiplexing confidence threshold (default 0.9). Lower values assign more cells but with higher mis-assignment risk. Only applies to cmo feature_type rows.

force_cells.errorMessage: force_cells must be a positive integer
force_cells.description: Force Cell Ranger to use this number of cells instead of auto-detection. Only applies to gex feature_type rows.

include_introns.description: Include intronic reads in gene expression quantification. Useful for single-nuclei RNA-seq. Only applies to gex feature_type rows.
